metadata.description: Official TrayaLabs plugin marketplace for Claude Code extensions

plugins.name: traya-frontend-engineering
plugins.description: AI-powered frontend development tools for React and Next.js that get smarter with every use. Make each unit of engineering work easier than the last. Includes 16 specialized agents, 7 commands, and 4 skills.

plugins.name: traya-react-native
plugins.description: AI-powered React Native development workflow with compounding engineering principles. Build high-quality iOS and Android apps with 16 specialized agents, 4 workflow skills, and 6 commands. Includes bundled MCP servers for Figma, iOS Simulator, Android testing, and API integration.

plugins.name: traya-backend-engineering
plugins.description: AI-powered backend development workflow with compounding engineering principles. Build scalable Node.js/NestJS APIs with 12 specialized agents, 5 workflow skills, and 6 commands. Covers PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, TypeORM, OpenAPI documentation, security, and comprehensive testing.
